# Stifle Spell, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature casting a spell

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** The Mage's Tower 

*As the creature casts a spell, you utter a simple magical phrase that momentarily confounds it.*

You cast this spell to distract another creature as it attempts to cast a spell. The target must succeed on a Concentration check (DC equal to 15 + your caster level + your key ability modifier + the level of the spell being cast) to ignore the distraction, or else it loses the spell.
